duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively share knowledge and provide a positive customer experience.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account-related questions from internal and external customers.
Respond to customer inquiries through appropriate mediums.
Attain performance level standards as outlined in performance objectives.
Build personal skill set by participating in in-house or outside insurance/industry related courses/seminars.
Model Farmers core values and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
